charges.charge_description: 18:2251.F   - SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF CHILDREN (Production of child pornography)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 300 months as to Count 1; 180 months as to Count 2 (to run consecutively with Count 1); Supervised Release: Life as to Counts 1 and 2; concurrent. Special Assessment: $200.00

charges.charge_description: 18:2252A.F   - ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO (Transportation of child pornography)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 300 months as to Count 1; 180 months as to Count 2 (to run consecutively with Count 1); Supervised Release: Life as to Counts 1 and 2; concurrent. Special Assessment: $200.00

charges.charge_description: 18:2251.F SEXUAL EXPLOITATION OF CHILDREN, 18:2252A.F ACTIVITIES RE MATERIAL CONSTITUTING/CONTAINING CHILD PORNO

charges.charge_disposition: IMPRISONMENT: 300 months as to Count 1; 180 months as to Count 2 (to run consecutively with Count 1); Supervised Release: Life as to Counts 1 and 2; concurrent. Special Assessment: $200.00
